name: Escape the Maze (skeliton112)
description:
You have found yourself stranded in a strange maze. You must find you way out, using whatever you can find as weapons.

Controls:
WASD to move
Left click to use your weapon
Right click to use magic
E to pick up weapons, magic items or stat upgrades

Note: The minotaur is a tad glitchy and may cause framerate issues, especially on larger maps. It can be disabled in the settings.
